code:
defmodule Solution do
  @spec shortest_beautiful_substring(s :: String.t, k :: integer) :: String.t
  def shortest_beautiful_substring(s, k) do
    s
    |> String.codepoints()
    |> Enum.reduce({[], 0, "", nil}, fn 
      "1", {buffer, ones_count, current_str, min_str} when ones_count < k - 1 ->
        {[["1"] | buffer], ones_count + 1, current_str <> "1", min_str}
      "1", {buffer, ones_count, current_str, min_str} ->
        new_str = current_str <> "1"
        new_min_str = case min_str do
          nil -> new_str
          _ -> Enum.min([min_str, new_str], &(&1 <= &2))
        end
        {[], 0, "", new_min_str}
      "0", {buffer, ones_count, current_str, min_str} when ones_count == k - 1 ->
        new_str = current_str <> "0"
        {[["0"] | buffer], ones_count, new_str, min_str}
      "0", {buffer, ones_count, current_str, min_str} ->
        {buffer, ones_count, current_str <> "0", min_str}
    end)
    |> (fn {_, _, _, min_str} -> min_str || "" end).()
  end
end
